text: within town centres. 15.70 Part 5 recognises that LMELs play a particularly important role in supplying workspace for local independent businesses, start-ups, and emerging industries, often at a lower cost than in POLs. Given the challenges of forecasting demand for space to support smaller businesses and emerging industries, it is essential to ensure that there is a pipeline of workspace that supports these businesses. Education uses can operate synergistically alongside local independent businesses, start-ups and emerging industries, providing academic expertise and a supply of graduates, as well as incubator spaces and other shared facilities.
